segments.text: I see a woman drying a plate, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a small lake on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s hard to believe she hasn’t noticed the mess under her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is she really that focused, or is she just pretending everything is fine?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window is quite beautiful, illuminating every detail.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the chaos behind her seems to contrast sharply with the calm outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he’s about to tip over any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder if he’s actually aware of the risk he’s taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing below him looks so eager for a cookie, her arm reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how unaware the woman is of the tiny heist happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
